author: Anonymous Mouse
title: Midterm2 P1
question: Hi, does anyone still have the paper for P1, with those arrows? I returned the paper after exam, but didn't get 100 for that problem, so now I couldn't know where did i make a mistake, if someone still keep that paper, could you give me a look? Thanks!
student_answer:
I don't believe anyone was allowed to keep those papers after the exam. 
The exact same data definitions for P1 can be found within P2 and P3.
